DOC.brief_title: A Community-based Study Target Childhood Obesity
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim assess efficacy community-based behavioral intervention ( H2GO ! ) target sugar-sweetened beverage water consumption among 108 parent-child pair ( N=216 ) site-randomized trial . The study set include 2 Boys Girls Club sit Massachusetts , USA pair-matched size racial/ethnic composition . The Boys Girls America national organization provide affordable after-school program large population ( ~4 million annually ) diverse youth ( 33 % White , 30 % Black , 23 % Latino ) predominantly low socioeconomic background 4,000 club facility across U.S . The H2GO ! intervention design address two behavioral target : reduce number sugar-sweetened beverage serving consume per day ( recommended guideline zero serving per day ) promote water consumption ( approximately 5-8 cup per day youth participant 8 cup per day parental participant ) . Informed Social Cognitive Theory Social Ecological Model , H2GO ! Intervention design target child parent participant ' knowledge , attitude ( self-efficacy , outcome expectation , perceive social norm ) behavioral capability relate sugar-sweetened beverage water consumption . The 6-week behavioral intervention consist group-based weekly session ( 1-hour session twice week ) deliver trained Boys Girls Club program staff Boys Girls Club site . Each intervention session consist 1-hour health module follow 1-hour narrative module . Topics health module include : understanding benefit water , sample different type fruit-flavored water , identify sugar-sweetened beverage , explore local grocery store , identify barrier facilitator drink water , manage trigger sugar-sweetened beverage . The narrative module include intervention objective activity reinforce knowledge , attitude , skill , behavior target previous health component . Child participant receive reusable water bottle pictorial intervention booklet . Developed study principal investigator ( PI ) research assistant , brightly-colored booklet culturally linguistically-tailored study population include intervention activity worksheet , parent-child take-home activity , fun fact quiz , beverage consumption track sheet . Activity worksheet complete participant intervention session ; parent-child take-home activity complete follow session . Study assessment take place baseline , 2 month , 6 month .
